◆ combine_robots()

CameraRobot vision_filter::CameraRobot::combine_robots ( const std::list< CameraRobot > &  robots)
static

Combines all the robots in the list and returns a robot with the average pos, time, and theta

Parameters
robotsThe list of robots to combine

Note: All robots must have the same robot_id
